p: Although Culicoides biting midges are regarded as incriminate vectors of AKAV, the virus has been obtained from three major mosquito genera ( Aedes, Culex, and Anopheles) in mainland China and Japan ( Table 5) ( 60, 84, 86). A small portion of mosquitoes that feed on infected cattle during viremia may be infected with AKAV, as observed in the experimental infection of Culex mosquitoes with SBV ( 252).
